theme: Something you would use when in a fight with crocodiles
judgesExplanation: While the others submitted items that could at least be thrown as a distraction, Player 4 chose to use a hand gesture. Against a creature with a brain the size of a walnut and several hundred pounds of bite force, an insult is truly the weakest weapon imaginable. Good luck with that strategy!
oneLiner: Bold strategy, but insulting a monster won't save your skin.
